11121.content:
Ever sense Juane asked Pyrrha to dance with him, he was trying to make up for his foolery. He should’ve asked her out, but he didn’t.

This sense of guilt only grew over the following weeks. For as the weeks went by, Juane started to realize just how much time Pyrrha spent with him and how little time she spent with others. Not to mention, Pyrrha more often than not acted as their conversation starter.

A few weeks later, Juane finally worked up the nerve to do something about it. He went to Nora for some relationship advice, since Ren didn’t seem nearly as talkative.

At one point on the calm sunny day while Pyrrha was out practicing, Juane nervously walked up to Nora in their room. “Um.. Nora, can-can I have some advice?”

Nora smiled “Sure thing Juane. Is it about Pyrrha?”

Juane blushed. “Yes. H-how’d you know?”

Nora just chuckled “Aww, it’s just female intuition is all. So what’s troubling you?”

Juane nervously looked away as he asked “Well… I feel really bad about not asking Pyrrha out to the dance and-“

Nora finished his sentence “it’s okay Juane. Believe me, Pyrrha is used to it.”

“That’s just it though! I’m the reason she’s used to it. She’s always been there for me and for some reason I became clueless.”

“Haha, it wouldn’t be the first time, that’s for sure.”

Juane responded rather depressed. “It wasn’t only that. I talked to her about Weiss rejecting me. For so long, I acted like I was in love with Weiss. I know I’ve changed sense then, I just… oh, I just feel so lousy. Is they anything I could get for Pyrrha that she’d love?”

Nora was taken aback by the sudden leap into serious-ness, but responded appropriately. “Well now, I’m getting the sense you want something bigger than just flowers.”

“Yeees. That’s right.”

“Well… there is this one thing that might do the trick..”

“Yes, what is it? Whatever it is, I’ll do it!”

“It was some magazine. Oh what was the name of it.. “Body Change.” I dunno. I think that was it. She’s talked to me about a couple things she wished you took notice of with your body. I can’t remember what those things were, but I believe she was reading about them from that magazine. I could be wrong, but it’s worth looking into.”

“Okay. I’ll go get it right away. Where is the magazine?”

“Um.. I think the latest copy she was reading is somewhere in her drawer. Left drawer maybe.”

Juane nodded and quickly looked for it. Luckily, he was successful and hid it in his breastplate armor. Then he rushed out the door to the library.

Nora nonchalantly said after he left “Haha, he better give me credit for this idea.”

Once Juane found a quiet secluded place in the library, he scrolled through the pages of the magazine in hope of some clue. And on the 7th page, he found it! There was a brief mention of something called “youth dust.” Reading over it, Juane thought it was referring to some sort of appearance changer, like a youthenizer or something. After all, he remembered how much his sisters talked about “how bad it was to look old.” In his mind, surely this had to be one of the things Pyrrha wanted. That said, he couldn’t remember her mentioning anything about him looking too old. He chalked that up to his own insensitivity though. So, in a record breaking speed he mailed a request to the address with the money attached. It was a modest 40 dollars and surely worth it for Pyrrha.

Immediately after sending his request through speed mail, he went back to his room and put the magazine back where he found it.

Nora perked up after seeing him back so soon. “So.. how’d it go? Do you think you got something good?”

“Ooh, absolutely! But I’ll keep it a surprise for tomorrow when it comes.”

Just then Pyrrha was coming in “Hi guys, how’s it been since I was gone?”

Juane spoke up first clearly showing something was up “Good.. good… I’ve got a great surprise waiting for you tomorrow!”

Pyrrha raised an eyebrow. “You do?! Well, thank you for telling me so soon.”

At Pyrrha’s response, Juane realized how stupid it was that he said that. He thought that it would hurt the surprise. So, he tried extra hard for the remainder of the day, to keep quiet.

Before Pyrrha knew it, the next day, a Saturday, had come. Juane eagerly woke up early to get their team mail and sure enough it came! The youth dust came with a little bit of instructions, which he breezed through. Once done, he planned to take it around noon for the surprise.

Once noon hit, he stopped Pyrrha before she went to the cafeteria with Ren and Nora. “Pyrrha, could you not leave just yet? I have that surprise to show you!” Nora and Ren just nodded and were out the door in a couple seconds.

“Ok.” Pyrrha gleefully said. “You know, Juane you didn’t have to. It was awe fully thoughtful though.”

“Nonsense. After what I did at the dance, I need to make it up to you.”

Pyrrha blushed “Juane. That was nothing. If anything, I made a mistake. I should’ve told you how I was feeling.”

“That’s kind of you to say, but I still felt it necessary. So, if you don’t mind, could you put on this blind fold?”

Pyrrha smiled and said “Ok. Tell me when you’re to take them off.” Pyrrha then blindfolded herself.

“Will do.” Once Pyrrha seemed fully blindfolded, Juane did as the instructions said; he drank the youth dust. Apparently, this youthenizer was triggered by drinking it. Juane thought it was weird, but he didn’t question it.

So, with no second thought, he drank the pink dust, instantaneously turning into a 1 year old. His clothes didn’t shrink with him though, leaving a big pile of clothes on the ground.

Once the regression was complete, he looked at his now chubby arms in complete shock. He couldn’t register exactly what happened, but he could tell one thing; whatever it was, it wasn’t good.

Unfortunately for Juane, Pyrrha heard the clatter of his armor fall to the ground and immediately became concerned. “J-Juane, is everything alri-“ After just slightly peeking out of the blindfold, she saw the pile with Juane’s clothes. “JUANE?! JUANE, WHERE DID YOU GO?!”

Then almost on que, Juane started crying. “WAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHHH!!”

Immediately Pyrrha connected the dots, becoming scared of what lied beneath Juane’s hoodie. She slowly kneeled down and moved the clothes around to see what was inside. Sure enough, her first guess was right. Juane turned into a baby!

After finding out the truth, she shook in fear for a couple seconds. Then, something triggered in her. Her instincts that is. She did what she immediately knew to do with crying babies; she cradled the now naked baby Juane, humming a lovely tune.

Her instincts served her well, since Juane quickly calmed down after. Once he was back together, she sat on the bed with him in her bosom and, as calmly as she could, asked “Juane.. what happened to you?”

Juane nervously replied “M-m-maga-zeen…”

Pyrrha became even more concerned “Which magazine Juane? What are you talking about?”

Juane became tear-y eyed for a little bit upon further questioning “Da-da-dat wun” Juane then pointed to Pyrrha’s drawer.

Pyrrha’s concern and agitation only grew with that response. Still, she took her precautions, wiping the tears from Juane’s cheek. Then she got up, holding Juane in her left arm and walked over to the dresser. She opened it and pulled out the only magazine she knew she had. “Is this the magazine, you were referring to Juane? What about it?”

“P-Pa-ja se-ben”

Pyrrha was in great suspense, but did what was instructed. Once she pulled to page seven, she immediately got a clue. “Juane… please tell me you didn’t use this youth dust on yourself?”

Juane just nodded in fear.

Pyrrha just facepalmed. “Let me guess. You thought it meant youthenizer, and the present was you’d appeal to my taste in looks?”

“Uh huh…”

Pyrrha sighed. “It’s okay Juane… we’ll find a cure. In the meantime, I’ll take care of you. Just please don’t make this mistake again.”

“K-kay…”

Pyrrha chuckled in response. “Don’t feel too bad though Juane. I’m not opposed to taking care of you for a couple days.” She then changed her expression to a more motherly one. “It helps me express something to you that I’ve been too embarrassed to express: love.” Pyrrha then lovingly hugged Juane.

Juane cooed in response to her hug. But then she said something terrifying.

“First things first though, you’ll need a diaper.”
11121.title: That's NOT What Youth Dust Meant!!!

11123.title: I don't know. Do some other character
